Class Mirror

java.lang.Object
  ocremixupdater.Mirror
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Mirror
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A mirror to download OC ReMixes from.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
 java.lang.String path
          A String representing the URL path to remixes at this mirror, minus the actual mix file name.
 boolean use
          Whether to download from this mirror or not.
